name: Kamer Sumac
description: Sumac, a dark red-burgundy coloured spice, is quite popular in the Middle East. It has a tangy flavour, quite close to that of lemon juice, and can be used to enhance a wide variety of dishes. We suggest dusting it over meats, salads, breads and desserts or in marinade for meat.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
